Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (50%) tosynthetic D4-NH2R=W: 33%; G=P: 17%.  GRAVY: -2.13; M Wt: 1695.957; Mol formula: C82H114N28O13; molar extinction coeff: 22200.Activity: active against E. coli ATCC 25922 or 1005 (MIC 2-8 uM), S. typhimurium 7731 (MIC 8 uM), S. aureus ATCC 29213 or 43300 MRSA (MIC 4 uM), B. subtilis 63501 (MIC 2 uM).Antimicrobial robustness:  Based on MIC changes in the presence of 150 mM NaCL: NaCl-insensitive:E. coli 25922; NaCl-sensitive:S. aureus 29213. Provided by Arjun Nair.
Literature Information.Author: Chou S, Shao C, Wang J, Shan A, Xu L, Dong N, Li Z.2016
Literature Information.Title: Short, multiple-stranded beta-hairpin peptides have antimicrobial potency with high selectivity and salt resistance.
